message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a product that I believe will be extremely valuable to you.  My research shows it could be worth up to $1,500,000 in your hands.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,250,000, a price that reflects both its potential value and my own investment.  This is a limited time offer, as I have another buyer ready to pay $1,000,000. Let me know what you think.
